text: hamane unake lie kuchh saathee niyukt kar die the. phir unhonne unake aage aur unake peechhe jo kuchh tha use suhaana banaakar unhen dikhaaya. antatah unapar bhee jinnon aur manushyon ke un girohon ke saath faisala satyaapit hokar raha, jo unase pahale guzar chuke the. nishchay hee ve ghaata uthaanevaale the
